peril.helpers

Class UnitHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • peril.helpers.UnitHelper

  • public final class UnitHelper
extends java.lang.Object
    Stores the ModelUnits that are currently in use. Singleton
    Since:
    2018-02-18
    Version:
    1.01.01
    Author:
    Joshua_Eddy
    See Also:
    ModelUnit, LinkedList
